title.rendered: How to Work with Big Box Retailers with Daniel Shnaider of Anybiz and Talor Ofer

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 23:16 — 21.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 23:16 — 21.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

AnyBiz is a super smart marketing tool that brings the right people, information, and tools together to grow. AnyBiz connects businesses, and drive collaboration forward.

AnyBiz – Find and reach potential customers using cold email campaigns. B2B sales prospecting and outreach, made simple.

Reaching potential customer is fast and super easy. Everything in one place. Database + Cold email campaign.

A one-stop-shop to reach potential customers. Everything is in one place. Simple dashboard. Great results.

In this episode you’ll learn:
  • Wholesale pricing
  • “They always prefer the cheapest” – is this true?
  • How do we get an ROI?
  • What metric would you use to assess a deal?
  • Talking about minimum order
  • Risk reduction

Resources

  • Contact Retail Empire and tell them we sent you and get a 20% off!
